Notes:
Not bad for a first release. Video has a slight flicker and quite a bit of movement so take note of
that. Took the source, tweaked it, filtered it, made the colours a little richer, dropped the file
size and here we go. Video: 7 - Audio: 8 - My honest A/V rating. Sample included. Enjoy. :P
